mapper.select: SELECT fo.*, fop.id, fop.parts_id, fop.parts_no, fop.parts_name, fop.parts_num FROM fix_order fo INNER JOIN fix_order_parts fop ON fo.order_id = fop.order_id WHERE fo.state = 2 or fo.state = 3 order by fo.state,order_time
SELECT fo.*, fop.id, fop.parts_id, fop.parts_no, fop.parts_name, fop.parts_num FROM fix_order fo INNER JOIN fix_order_parts fop ON fo.order_id = fop.order_id where fo.order_id = #{id}
